评论详情: Such a cute statement ring. Easily adjustable and looks/feels luxurious!

This is an adjustable ring, it fits my size 7 finger if I want to put it on a larger finger or a different finger I would have to stretch it out so much that half of my finger would be showing through the ring that’s not pretty so I’m sending it back is packaged beautifully very shiny and pretty back.
